Detailed Description

AuthGatewayMethod is the Interface by which the Authentication Gateway will access specific authentication methods.

Author:
Kenneth Sharp
Version:
3.0 (released September 15, 2005)

Member Function Documentation

void edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewayMethod.addConfigurationData (  AuthGatewaySession  auth  ) 
 

Adds data for the user from the appropriate configuration database.

Parameters:
AuthGatewaySession auth is the session object to be populated.

Implemented in edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.smb.authentication.SMBAuth_SimpleUserDB.

boolean edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewayMethod.authenticateUser (  String  userID,
String  encodedUserPwd,
AuthGatewaySession  auth
) 
 

Authenticates the user and records the fact in the AuthGatewaySession object. Returns true or false.

Parameters:
String userID is the clear text userID to be authenticated
String encodedUserPwd is the Base64-encoded userID:password pair
AuthGatewaySession is the session object to be populated.
Returns:
true if the user is authenticated false otherwise.

Implemented in edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.smb.authentication.SMBAuth_SimpleUserDB.

void edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewayMethod.updateAccessLog (  String  appName,
String  userName,
HttpSession  session
) 
 

Updates an access log to record user visits to an application.

Parameters:
String appName - application being accessed.
String userName - userid of user visiting the application.
HttpSession session - current user session.

Implemented in edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.smb.authentication.SMBAuth_SimpleUserDB.
